title: Monitor Your Website Globally & in Real-Time
description: Ensure your website's performance and uptime from various devices and locations worldwide. Get accurate insights, detect problems faster, and optimize user experience with multi-device & multi-geolocation monitoring.

service.title: Our Services
service.description: Enjoy the best services to simplify your work, including:

service.Monitoring: Real-time Monitoring: Monitor sensor data directly without delay.
service.MultiGeologi: Multi-Geolocation: Get deeper analysis with support for various geographic locations.
service.Notification: Notifications: Receive instant notifications about the latest data or important conditions.
service.Report: Reports: Access complete and easy-to-understand reports for further analysis.

tourGuide.title: Welcome
tourGuide.content: Welcome to our monitoring application. This application is used to monitor water quality in your community.

tourGuide.content: Please verify your email to activate your account and get full access to all features.

tourGuide.content: Click this icon to see the latest notifications or access your notification settings.

tourGuide.content: In this area, manage your notification preferences. Be sure to add your WhatsApp number and Telegram ID so you receive important updates.

tourGuide.title: Select Start Month

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our multi-device monitoring platform
faq.notFound: Didn't find the answer you were looking for? Please use the contact form on the left.

general.question: What is a multi-device monitoring platform?
general.answer: Our platform is a comprehensive solution for monitoring multiple devices across various geographic locations. It provides real-time data visualization, alerts, and analytics for your connected devices, allowing you to manage and monitor your IoT ecosystem from a single dashboard.

general.question: How many devices can I monitor simultaneously?
general.answer: Our platform supports monitoring an unlimited number of devices, depending on your subscription plan. The basic plan allows up to 10 devices, while premium plans offer monitoring for hundreds of devices across multiple locations.

general.question: What types of devices are compatible with the platform?
general.answer: Our platform is compatible with a wide range of IoT devices, including sensors, controllers, cameras, and custom hardware. Any device that can connect to the internet and send data via our supported protocols (MQTT, HTTP, WebSockets) can be integrated.

general.question: How does the multi-geolocation feature work?
general.answer: Our platform allows you to organize devices by location and view them on an interactive map. You can create location groups, set up geofences, and monitor devices based on their geographical position. This is particularly useful for distributed systems like agricultural monitoring, environmental sensing, or multi-site business operations.

iot.question: How do I get the IoT code for my device?
iot.answer: Our platform provides ready-to-use code snippets for various IoT devices and microcontrollers. Simply navigate to the "IoT Code" section in your dashboard, select your device type (Arduino, ESP8266, ESP32, Raspberry Pi, etc.), and download the pre-configured code. You can also customize code parameters directly on the platform.

iot.question: What programming languages are supported for IoT integration?
iot.answer: We provide code examples and libraries in various languages including C/C++ (for Arduino and ESP devices), Python (for Raspberry Pi and other Linux-based devices), JavaScript (for Node.js based devices), and MicroPython (for compatible microcontrollers).

iot.question: Can I integrate existing devices with different protocols?
iot.answer: Yes, our platform supports various integration methods. For devices using standard protocols like MQTT, HTTP, or WebSockets, you can use our API endpoints directly. For proprietary protocols, we offer gateway solutions that can translate between protocols. Additionally, our platform provides webhook integrations for third-party services.

iot.question: How secure is the connection between my devices and the platform?
iot.answer: All communication between your devices and our platform is encrypted using TLS/SSL. We implement device authentication using unique API keys or certificates, and all data is transmitted securely. Our platform also supports additional security features like IP whitelisting and two-factor authentication for the dashboard.

tutorials.question: How do I access the platform tutorials?
tutorials.answer: Tutorials are available in the "Learning Center" section of your dashboard. We offer step-by-step guides, video tutorials, and interactive walkthroughs for all platform features. New users automatically receive a guided tour upon first login, which can be replayed anytime from the Help menu.

tutorials.question: What is covered in the interactive tour guide?
tutorials.answer: Our interactive tour guide walks you through the main features of the platform, including dashboard navigation, device setup, notification configuration, data visualization, and report generation. The tour is contextual, meaning it adapts to your specific setup and subscription level.

tutorials.question: Are there specific tutorials for setting up different types of monitoring?
tutorials.answer: Yes, we provide specific tutorials for various monitoring scenarios, including aquaculture monitoring, environmental sensing, industrial equipment monitoring, and smart farming. Each tutorial covers hardware setup recommendations, code examples, and configuration guidelines specific to that application.

tutorials.question: Can I request a custom tutorial for my specific use case?
tutorials.answer: Premium subscribers can request custom tutorials tailored to their specific implementation needs. Our technical team will create personalized guides and even offer one-on-one virtual sessions to help you optimize your monitoring setup.

notifications.question: How do I set up WhatsApp notifications?
notifications.answer: To configure WhatsApp notifications, go to the "Notifications" section in your dashboard and select "Add WhatsApp Channel." You will need to enter the phone number(s) you want to receive alerts on and verify each number via a one-time code. Our system uses the official WhatsApp Business API to deliver messages reliably.

notifications.question: How do I integrate Telegram notifications?
notifications.answer: For Telegram notifications, navigate to the "Notifications" section and select "Add Telegram Channel." You will need to provide your Telegram user ID or group ID. Our system will guide you through the process of connecting with our Telegram bot, which will deliver the notifications.

notifications.question: Can I customize notification messages and their frequency?
notifications.answer: Yes, our platform offers extensive customization for notifications. You can create custom message templates, set notification priorities, define quiet hours, and configure alert thresholds. For each alert type, you can specify which channels should receive the notification and set different message formats for each channel.

notifications.question: What other notification channels are supported?
notifications.answer: In addition to WhatsApp and Telegram, our platform supports email notifications, SMS, push notifications (via our mobile app), voice calls for critical alerts, webhook integrations for custom systems, and integrations with popular services like Slack, Microsoft Teams, and Discord.

monitoring.question: How does the fish monitoring system work?
monitoring.answer: Our aquaculture monitoring system uses specialized sensors to track water quality parameters (temperature, pH, dissolved oxygen, ammonia levels), fish behavior patterns, and feeding metrics. The platform collects this data in real-time and provides analytics to optimize fish health and growth.

monitoring.question: How do I set fish monitoring thresholds?
monitoring.answer: In the "Monitoring Settings" section, select your aquaculture project and navigate to "Thresholds." Here, you can set specific parameters for each monitored value. For example, you can define acceptable ranges for water temperature, oxygen levels, and pH. When readings fall outside these ranges, the system will trigger alerts based on your notification preferences.

monitoring.question: Can the system monitor different fish species with different needs?
monitoring.answer: Yes, our platform allows you to create species-specific profiles with different monitoring parameters. You can set up multiple monitoring zones within the same location, each with its own thresholds and alert settings. This is particularly useful for facilities raising multiple species with varying environmental requirements.

monitoring.question: Does the platform provide predictive analytics for fish health?
monitoring.answer: Yes, our premium plans include predictive analytics that use historical data and machine learning to forecast potential issues before they become critical. The system can predict water quality trends, detect subtle changes in fish behavior that might indicate disease, and recommend preventive actions to maintain optimal conditions for your aquaculture operation.

monitoring.question: How does the fish counting and biomass estimation feature work?
monitoring.answer: Our platform uses computer vision technology via underwater cameras to estimate fish count and biomass. The system can track growth rates over time, helping you optimize feeding schedules and harvest times. This feature requires compatible underwater camera equipment and is available on our advanced subscription plans.
